title: Handover and SA Transfer
content: Shift handovers are high-risk moments for SA loss. The outgoing operator has hours of accumulated SA. The incoming operator starts with zero. Effective handovers transfer not just system status but also trends, concerns, anticipated events, and active hazards.

scenario.story: You're handing over a shift. The system is currently stable, but 45 minutes ago you noticed an unusual vibration in a pump that hasn't recurred. You also expect a delivery truck in 2 hours that will require traffic management. The relief operator asks 'anything I need to know?'

options.B: System is stable now. Two things: pump showed unusual vibration earlierâ€”it resolved but watch it. Also, delivery coming in 2 hours, will need traffic management.

scenario.explanation: Effective handover transfers your SA: current state (stable), concerns (pump vibration), and anticipated events (delivery). The incoming operator now starts with SA rather than having to build it from zero.
